ModulePrefs.title: AdSense for HexaD
ModulePrefs.description: Simple AdSense gadget for google code.
ModulePrefs.author: HexaD

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript"><!--
google_ad_client = "pub-8310304182164784";
/* Vertical banner for duplicati.code.google.com */
google_ad_slot = "7234168874";
google_ad_width = 468;
google_ad_height = 60;
//-->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript"
src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
</script>
